title: EU to Internet giants: Drop extremist content in an hour
text:
EU to Internet giants: Drop extremist content in an hour 3:08pm GMT - 00:45 
The European Commission has told firms like Google and Facebook to remove extremist content - such as Islamic State propaganda - an hour after it is first notified, or face legislation forcing them to do so.   
The European Commission has told firms like Google and Facebook to remove extremist content - such as Islamic State propaganda - an hour after it is first notified, or face legislation forcing them to do so.  //reut.rs/2HTAVls
